remarks: If two words have the same prefix, their symbols are identical within this prefix.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 5-Jul-2018.)
statement:
swrdsymbeq $p |- ( ( ( U e. Word V /\ W e. Word V ) /\ ( N e. NN0 /\ N <_ ( # ` U ) /\ N <_ ( # ` W ) ) ) -> ( ( U substr <. 0 , N >. ) = ( W substr <. 0 , N >. ) -> A. i e. ( 0 ..^ N ) ( U ` i ) = ( W ` i ) ) ) $.
$d N i $.
$d U i $.
$d V i $.
$d W i $.
